Best Beginner Welding Helmets – Top Picks & Reviews

June 9, 2021February 13, 2021 by Brayden
1.6k
SHARES
ShareTweet

Are you looking for the best beginner welding helmet? Yeah you’re at the right place. I will guide you in choosing a good starter welding helmet that will satisfy all your needs. Welding helmets play an important role in the safety of the user. There are a lot of factors that should be considered while you choose the welding helmets for beginners like It should be simple in its operation so that a beginner can use it easily.

The weight of the helmet is a very important feature in choosing a new one, likewise it should be lightweight, so the user feels comfortable and enjoy the work. Another important feature is that they must protect your eyes from UV/IR radiation. It should have a clear view of the working object and true color recognition in it.

Moreover, helmet for beginners has to be free from any type of mid spark. The hood used in the helmet is comfortable for the user and it should be adjustable so every user can set it according to his needs. These are the main factors for the beginners when he is choosing the best starter welding helmet.

Related: Best Budget Welding helmets

Best overall

Antra AH6-260-0000

Specifications:

  • Viewing Area: 98mm x 44mm / 3.86″ x1.73″
  • Cartridge Size: 110mm x 90mm x 9mm / 4.33″ x 3.54″ x 0.35″
  • Optical Class: 1/1/1/2
  • Reaction Time: 0.00004(1/25,000) Seconds
  • Dark to Light: 0.1-1 Seconds
  • Light State: Shade DIN 4
  • Dark State: Shade DIN 5-9/9-13
  • DC TIG Amperage Rating: >2 Amps
  • Battery Type: Solar Cell + 2X CR2032 installed (Replaceable)
  • Item Weight: 1 pounds
  • Product Dimensions: 9 x 9 x 12 inches
  • Size: 3.86X1.73″(4/5-9/9-13)
Check On Amazon

Overview:

Antra AH6-260-000 is a very economical and best beginner welding helmet because it has many useful features. It is the top rated beginner welding helmet and perfect choice for those who are looking to start welding. A lightweight helmet, used in cutting, grinding, and welding operations. Its functions are automatic in its operation. It is very easy to use this helmet for beginners. Battery is assisted with solar cells.

The price of this helmet is very reasonable according to the functions and the features it contains. It is used for different types of welding and grinding operations. Its screen is not too big but enough that the user can see the object. It has permanent shade to UV/IR radiations and provides a sufficient and accurate shade range for the visible light.

Pros
  • Fast Reaction Time: 0.00004
  • A clear view of the workpiece 
  • Light Weight, One Pound
  • It provides full neck and head coverage
  • It has a crystal clear lens with a wide range
  • It has a flexible headgear mechanism 
  • Used for TIG, AC TIG, MIG/MAG and plasma cutting
  • Adjustable strap and headband worked well to adjust head
  • Super light, feels sturdy enough
  • Comes with 5 extra lenses which are easy to replace
  • Great budget helmet
Cons
  • Flashed between Welding

Why you should choose this product?

I love this helmet because of its features in which an affordable price for beginners. You should buy it if you are looking for a helmet that has very good features at such a low price. You can simply say it cheap valuable welding helmet.

Lincoln Electric K3034-4

Specifications:

  • Weight: 3 pounds
  • Dimensions: 12.6 x 10.6 x 10.4 inches

  • Material: Plastic
  • Optical Clarity: 1/1/1/1

  • Viewing Area: 3.74″ x 3.34″
  • Switching Speed: 1/25,000 Sec
  • Outside Cover Lens: 4.5 x 5.25
  • Controls: Shade, Sensitivity & Delay
  • TIG Amp Rating: 2 Amps
  • Power Source: CR 2450 Battery + Solar Cell
Check On Amazon

Overview:

If you are looking for the best beginner welding helmet, then Lincoln Electric K3034-4 is very good for you. It has very impressive features in it that is why every beginner likes it. The main reason behind its success that it has advanced 4c lens technology in it that gives a crystal-clear view and true color of the arc and puddle that helps you in doing good quality work and reduces eye strain.

It also has a very big screen view for the user so that he can see the whole object clearly and uses the 1/1/1/1 optical clarity in it. It does not show common lens problems like distortion and blurriness and has an external grind button in it so you can change the mood in just three seconds without taking off the helmet.

A very comfortable X6 headgear to facilitate the user in doing a job and its outdoor performance is very good. The battery used in it has a long life and you will get 3 years warranty on Lincoln Electric K3034-4 that is a big advantage, therefore, user likes it.

It is very lightweight and comfortable for the user and covers the user’s neck so provides safety to the user from sparks. It is a fully automatic auto darkening welding helmet for beginners.

It is very easy to use has a simple internal setting and because of its unique design it is very good for tight spaces. 4 premium arc sensors are available which has very responsive and the control unit has a very fast switching time. It is cool looking best beginner welding helmet and used for almost all types of welding operations.

It ensures all safety standards in it which are very important for a user. The reaction rate is very good in this welding helmet. It can be used for grinding and welding.

FAQ’s

According to my knowledge and research on all the welding helmet for beginners, I recommend Antra AH6-260-0000 to you. It has very good features at such a reasonable price that’s why I recommend it as the best welding helmet for beginners.

The main factors that are very important in selecting the best welding helmet for students are the price of the helmet and the safety standards in it. Keeping in mind all the factors I recommend Jackson Safety W10 HSL 100 for the students.

I have considered different basic welding helmets and choose the very cheap one and a good welding helmet for beginners which is Hobart 770286. It is very cheap has good features and meets the safety standards which are very important for the user.

Conclusion

Here is the final verdict to help you in the selection of the best beginner welding helmet from this list. For the beginners who have no issue with the price of the helmet, I suggest Lincoln Electric K3034-4. Although its price is high as compared to others in the list it proves to be the best for those who are not price-conscious. If you are looking for an awesome beginner welding helmet that has good features and not expensive then you must go for Antra AH6-260-0000. It proves to be best for beginners and students. If someone Is looking for a basic welding helmet that fulfills user needs and very cheap then Hobart 770286 is a very good choice.
